creator: theScore, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Find out why millions of sports fans trust theScore as their number one sports app!! 🏈 🏀 ⚾️ ⚽️

theScore brings you news, scores, stats, sports betting coverage and videos from NFL Football, NBA Basketball, NCAA Basketball, MLB Baseball, NCAA Football, NHL Hockey, WNBA Basketball, English Premier League Soccer, La Liga Soccer, Champions League Soccer, PGA Golf - and every major league and competition!

We’ve got live coverage of all the teams you care about, including the Dallas Cowboys, Buffalo Bills, Cleveland Browns, Pittsburgh Steelers, Philadelphia Eagles, New Orleans Saints, Minnesota Vikings, Green Bay Packers, New England Patriots, Carolina Panthers & more!

Coverage of NBA, NCAAB, MLB, NFL, NHL, WNBA, PGA, MMA, Premier League soccer and more!


TOP HIGHLIGHTS INCLUDE:

*Favorites - YOUR personalized feed. All the content you care about from your favorite teams, players and leagues.

*Scores - A live view of every game. Every score at a glance, updated in real-time. Just tap the matchup for detailed box scores, including live player data, betting lines, news and multimedia.

*News - Get updated on the top headlines in an instant from across all sports, or tap the league you want at the top of the page to dive deeper.

*Leagues - Check out the latest news, scores, standings, and leaders for the sport you care about.

*Chat & Messaging - Who doesn’t like talking sports? Check out our cool chat and messaging features, helping you connect with other fans around the games and content you love. Public Chat is available in every matchup page, while you can also set-up group messaging with friends and family or just chat 1-1 too through the 'Messaging' icon found in the top right of the screen.

*Discover - Uncover the biggest social stories and multimedia that’s got sports fans talking! This is where you’ll find Russ’ latest swag or the sick dunk that’s going viral.

Team stats, real-time scores, and news across these major sports:

• Football (NFL, NCAA and CFL, regular season and playoffs, and news coverage of AAF)

• Baseball (College World Series and MLB, season play and playoffs)

• Basketball (NBA, NCAA, WNBA, Big 3 - including all the madness and bracket tracking from the NCAA Division 1 Men’s Basketball Tournament in March & playoffs)

• Hockey (NHL, IIHF WJHC - World Junior Hockey Championship, NCAA Frozen Four)

• Soccer (Premier League, Champions League, FIFA World Cup, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, MLS, FA Cup, League Cup, Europa League, Ligue 1, Coppa Italia, Copa Del Rey and Liga MX, UEFA European Championships)

• Golf (The Masters, PGA, LPGA, Ryder Cup, European Tour, Web.com Tour)

• Tennis (ATP, WTA)

• Mixed Martial Arts (MMA: UFC and Bellator)

• Auto Racing (Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, Formula 1)

• Lacrosse (NLL)

• WWE wrestling


Need help? Email thescoreapp@thescore.com or via ‘Report a Bug’ in the Settings menu.

--

We are affiliated with theScore.com

Privacy Policy: http://www.thescore.com/pages/privacy

Terms of Use: http://www.thescore.com/pages/terms
descriptionShort: Scores, news, stats, videos for NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, EPL, PGA, MMA, NCAA and more

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
General performance enhancements and bug fixes.
Love using theScore? Please leave us a review - we read and respond to them all!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
NEW! We have been hard at work retooling and revamping our Android app and are excited to finally share it with you. Some highlights include:

* Increased app performance and stability
* Design updates to optimize the viewing and navigation experience
* Over 50% reduction in app download size

If you have any questions or experience an issue, please reach out through the link on our support page.

Thanks for being a loyal theScore user!

title: theScore: Live Sports Scores, News, Stats & Videos

creator: Score Media Ventures Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Find out why millions of sports fans trust theScore as their number one sports app!! 🏈 🏀 ⚾️ ⚽️

theScore brings you news, scores, stats, sports betting coverage and videos from NFL Football, NBA Basketball, NCAA Basketball, MLB Baseball, NCAA Football, NHL Hockey, WNBA Basketball, English Premier League Soccer, La Liga Soccer, Champions League Soccer, PGA Golf - and every major league and competition!

We’ve got live coverage of all the teams you care about, including the Dallas Cowboys, Buffalo Bills, Cleveland Browns, Pittsburgh Steelers, Philadelphia Eagles, New Orleans Saints, Minnesota Vikings, Green Bay Packers, New England Patriots, Carolina Panthers & more!

Coverage of NBA, NCAAB, MLB, NFL, NHL, WNBA, PGA, MMA, Premier League soccer and more!


TOP HIGHLIGHTS INCLUDE:

*Favorites - YOUR personalized feed. All the content you care about from your favorite teams, players and leagues.

*Scores - A live view of every game. Every score at a glance, updated in real-time. Just tap the matchup for detailed box scores, including live player data, betting lines, news and multimedia.

*News - Get updated on the top headlines in an instant from across all sports, or tap the league you want at the top of the page to dive deeper.

*Leagues - Check out the latest news, scores, standings, and leaders for the sport you care about.

*Chat & Messaging - Who doesn’t like talking sports? Check out our cool chat and messaging features, helping you connect with other fans around the games and content you love. Public Chat is available in every matchup page, while you can also set-up group messaging with friends and family or just chat 1-1 too through the 'Messaging' icon found in the top right of the screen.

*Discover - Uncover the biggest social stories and multimedia that’s got sports fans talking! This is where you’ll find Russ’ latest swag or the sick dunk that’s going viral.

Team stats, real-time scores, and news across these major sports:

• Football (NFL, NCAA and CFL, regular season and playoffs, and news coverage of AAF)

• Baseball (College World Series and MLB, season play and playoffs)

• Basketball (NBA, NCAA, WNBA, Big 3 - including all the madness and bracket tracking from the NCAA Division 1 Men’s Basketball Tournament in March & playoffs)

• Hockey (NHL, IIHF WJHC - World Junior Hockey Championship, NCAA Frozen Four)

• Soccer (Premier League, Champions League, FIFA World Cup, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, MLS, FA Cup, League Cup, Europa League, Ligue 1, Coppa Italia, Copa Del Rey and Liga MX, UEFA European Championships)

• Golf (The Masters, PGA, LPGA, Ryder Cup, European Tour, Web.com Tour)

• Tennis (ATP, WTA)

• Mixed Martial Arts (MMA: UFC and Bellator)

• Auto Racing (Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, Formula 1)

• Lacrosse (NLL)

• WWE wrestling


Need help? Email thescoreapp@thescore.com or via ‘Report a Bug’ in the Settings menu.

creator: Score Media Ventures Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Find out why millions of sports fans trust theScore as their number one sports app!! 🏈 🏀 ⚾️ ⚽️

theScore brings you news, scores, stats, sports betting coverage and videos from NFL Football, NBA Basketball, NCAA Basketball, MLB Baseball, NCAA Football, NHL Hockey, WNBA Basketball, English Premier League Soccer, La Liga Soccer, Champions League Soccer, PGA Golf - and every major league and competition!

We’ve got live coverage of all the teams you care about, including the Dallas Cowboys, Buffalo Bills, Cleveland Browns, Pittsburgh Steelers, Philadelphia Eagles, New Orleans Saints, Minnesota Vikings, Green Bay Packers, New England Patriots, Carolina Panthers & more!

Coverage of NBA, NCAAB, MLB, NFL, NHL, WNBA, PGA, MMA, Premier League soccer and more!


TOP HIGHLIGHTS INCLUDE:

*Favorites - YOUR personalized feed. All the content you care about from your favorite teams, players and leagues.

*Scores - A live view of every game. Every score at a glance, updated in real-time. Just tap the matchup for detailed box scores, including live player data, betting lines, news and multimedia.

*News - Get updated on the top headlines in an instant from across all sports, or tap the league you want at the top of the page to dive deeper.

*Leagues - Check out the latest news, scores, standings, and leaders for the sport you care about.

*Chat & Messaging - Who doesn’t like talking sports? Check out our cool chat and messaging features, helping you connect with other fans around the games and content you love. Public Chat is available in every matchup page, while you can also set-up group messaging with friends and family or just chat 1-1 too through the 'Messaging' icon found in the top right of the screen.

*Discover - Uncover the biggest social stories and multimedia that’s got sports fans talking! This is where you’ll find Russ’ latest swag or the sick dunk that’s going viral.

Team stats, real-time scores, and news across these major sports:

• Football (NFL, NCAA and CFL, regular season and playoffs, and news coverage of AAF)

• Baseball (College World Series and MLB, season play and playoffs)

• Basketball (NBA, NCAA, WNBA, Big 3 - including all the madness and bracket tracking from the NCAA Division 1 Men’s Basketball Tournament in March & playoffs)

• Hockey (NHL, IIHF WJHC - World Junior Hockey Championship, NCAA Frozen Four)

• Soccer (Premier League, Champions League, FIFA World Cup, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, MLS, FA Cup, League Cup, Europa League, Ligue 1, Coppa Italia, Copa Del Rey and Liga MX, UEFA European Championships)

• Golf (The Masters, PGA, LPGA, Ryder Cup, European Tour, Web.com Tour)

• Tennis (ATP, WTA)

• Mixed Martial Arts (MMA: UFC and Bellator)

• Auto Racing (Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, Formula 1)

• Lacrosse (NLL)

• WWE wrestling


Need help? Email thescoreapp@thescore.com or via ‘Report a Bug’ in the Settings menu.

title: theScore: Sports News & Scores

creator: Score Media Ventures Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Find out why millions of sports fans trust theScore as their number one sports app!

theScore brings you news, scores, stats, sports betting coverage, and videos from NFL Football, NBA Basketball, NCAA Basketball, MLB Baseball, NCAA Football, NHL Hockey, WNBA Basketball, English Premier League Soccer, La Liga Soccer, Champions League Soccer, PGA Golf - and every major league and competition!

theScore delivers real-time scoring updates and alerts, breaking news, the deepest in-game stats, videos, and social content. theScore is fast, comprehensive, and super simple to use:

*BET MODE- Get into Bet Mode to unlock the ultimate gaming experience between theScore and theScore Bet: Sportsbook & Casino, including the ability to build and track your bets, lightning-fast scores, pregame and live markets, and deep betting coverage.
*FAVOURITES - This is YOUR personalised feed. All the content you care about from your favourite teams, players and leagues. Tap ‘Manage’ to add, delete or reorder your favourites. Never miss a key moment when you set-up your notifications!

*SCORES - A live view of every game updated in real-time. Select the matchup for the full boxscore, including team and player stats, odds and lines, last plays, news, and more.

*CHAT & MESSAGING - Who doesn’t like talking sports? Check out our cool chat and messaging features and connect with other fans around the leagues, teams and games you care about.

*DISCOVER - Stay in the know on the biggest social stories and multimedia content that’s got sports fans talking!

*NEWS - Get updated on the top headlines in an instant across all sports, including comprehensive betting coverage, fantasy analysis, and more.

*LEAGUES - Check out the latest news, scores, standings, and leaders for all the sports you care about.

theScore offers deep coverage and real-time alerts for every major league and competition, including:

- Football (NFL Football, NCAA Football, and CFL Football, regular season and playoffs)
- Baseball (College World Series and MLB Baseball, season play and playoffs)
- Basketball (NBA Basketball, WNBA Basketball, NCAA Basketball - including the NCAA Men’s Basketball Tournament and playoffs)
- Hockey (NHL Hockey, IIHF WJHC - World Junior Hockey Championship, NCAA Frozen Four)
- Soccer (Premier League Soccer, Champions League, FIFA World Cup, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, MLS, - FA Cup, League Cup, Europa League, Ligue 1, Coppa Italia, Copa Del Rey and Liga MX, UEFA European Championships)
- Golf (PGA, LPGA, Ryder Cup, European Tour, Web.com Tour)
- Tennis (ATP, WTA), with the US Open coming in August
- Mixed Martial Arts (MMA: UFC and Bellator)
- Auto Racing (NASCAR Sprint Cup, Formula 1)
- Lacrosse (NLL)

__

Need help, have feedback or want to request a new feature? Contact us via the Settings menu or email us via support@thescore.com. You can also chat to us on Twitter via @theScoreHelp.

Website: www.thescore.com
Privacy Policy: www.thescore.com/pages/privacy
Terms of Use: www.thescore.com/pages/terms

Visit www.scoremediaandgaming.com for more information and other apps.

title: theScore: Sports News & Scores

creator: Score Media Ventures Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Find out why millions of sports fans trust theScore as their number one sports app!! 🏈 🏀 ⚾️ ⚽️

theScore brings you news, scores, stats, sports betting coverage and videos from NFL Football, NBA Basketball, NCAA Basketball, MLB Baseball, NCAA Football, NHL Hockey, WNBA Basketball, English Premier League Soccer, La Liga Soccer, Champions League Soccer, PGA Golf - and every major league and competition!

We’ve got live coverage of all the teams you care about, including the Dallas Cowboys, Buffalo Bills, Cleveland Browns, Pittsburgh Steelers, Philadelphia Eagles, New Orleans Saints, Minnesota Vikings, Green Bay Packers, New England Patriots, Carolina Panthers & more!

Coverage of NBA, NCAAB, MLB, NFL, NHL, WNBA, PGA, MMA, Premier League soccer and more!


TOP HIGHLIGHTS INCLUDE:

*Favorites - YOUR personalized feed. All the content you care about from your favorite teams, players and leagues.

*Scores - A live view of every game. Every score at a glance, updated in real-time. Just tap the matchup for detailed box scores, including live player data, betting lines, news and multimedia.

*News - Get updated on the top headlines in an instant from across all sports, or tap the league you want at the top of the page to dive deeper.

*Leagues - Check out the latest news, scores, standings, and leaders for the sport you care about.

*Chat & Messaging - Who doesn’t like talking sports? Check out our cool chat and messaging features, helping you connect with other fans around the games and content you love. Public Chat is available in every matchup page, while you can also set-up group messaging with friends and family or just chat 1-1 too through the 'Messaging' icon found in the top right of the screen.

*Discover - Uncover the biggest social stories and multimedia that’s got sports fans talking! This is where you’ll find Russ’ latest swag or the sick dunk that’s going viral.

Team stats, real-time scores, and news across these major sports:

• Football (NFL, NCAA and CFL, regular season and playoffs, and news coverage of AAF)

• Baseball (College World Series and MLB, season play and playoffs)

• Basketball (NBA, NCAA, WNBA, Big 3 - including all the madness and bracket tracking from the NCAA Division 1 Men’s Basketball Tournament in March & playoffs)

• Hockey (NHL, IIHF WJHC - World Junior Hockey Championship, NCAA Frozen Four)

• Soccer (Premier League, Champions League, FIFA World Cup, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, MLS, FA Cup, League Cup, Europa League, Ligue 1, Coppa Italia, Copa Del Rey and Liga MX, UEFA European Championships)

• Golf (The Masters, PGA, LPGA, Ryder Cup, European Tour, Web.com Tour)

• Tennis (ATP, WTA)

• Mixed Martial Arts (MMA: UFC and Bellator)

• Auto Racing (Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, Formula 1)

• Lacrosse (NLL)

• WWE wrestling


Need help? Email thescoreapp@thescore.com or via ‘Report a Bug’ in the Settings menu.

Coverage of NBA, NCAAB, MLB, NFL, NHL, WNBA, PGA, MMA, Premier League soccer and more!


TOP HIGHLIGHTS INCLUDE:

*Favorites - YOUR personalized feed. All the content you care about from your favorite teams, players and leagues.

*Scores - A live view of every game. Every score at a glance, updated in real-time. Just tap the matchup for detailed box scores, including live player data, betting lines, news and multimedia.

*News - Get updated on the top headlines in an instant from across all sports, or tap the league you want at the top of the page to dive deeper.

*Leagues - Check out the latest news, scores, standings, and leaders for the sport you care about.

*Chat & Messaging - Who doesn’t like talking sports? Check out our cool chat and messaging features, helping you connect with other fans around the games and content you love. Public Chat is available in every matchup page, while you can also set-up group messaging with friends and family or just chat 1-1 too through the 'Messaging' icon found in the top right of the screen.

*Discover - Uncover the biggest social stories and multimedia that’s got sports fans talking! This is where you’ll find Russ’ latest swag or the sick dunk that’s going viral.

Team stats, real-time scores, and news across these major sports:

• Football (NFL, NCAA and CFL, regular season and playoffs, and news coverage of AAF)

• Baseball (College World Series and MLB, season play and playoffs)

• Basketball (NBA, NCAA, WNBA, Big 3 - including all the madness and bracket tracking from the NCAA Division 1 Men’s Basketball Tournament in March & playoffs)

• Hockey (NHL, IIHF WJHC - World Junior Hockey Championship, NCAA Frozen Four)

• Soccer (Premier League, Champions League, FIFA World Cup, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, MLS, FA Cup, League Cup, Europa League, Ligue 1, Coppa Italia, Copa Del Rey and Liga MX, UEFA European Championships)

• Golf (The Masters, PGA, LPGA, Ryder Cup, European Tour, Web.com Tour)

• Tennis (ATP, WTA)

• Mixed Martial Arts (MMA: UFC and Bellator)

• Auto Racing (Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, Formula 1)

• Lacrosse (NLL)

• WWE wrestling

title: theScore: Sports News & Scores

container.value: 125 Queens Quay E, Toronto, ON, Canada M5A 0Z6

creator: Score Media and Gaming Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Find out why millions of sports fans trust theScore as their number one sports app!

theScore brings you news, scores, stats and videos from NFL Football, NBA Basketball, NCAA Basketball, MLB Baseball, NCAA Football, NHL Hockey, WNBA Basketball, English Premier League Soccer, La Liga Soccer, Champions League Soccer, PGA Golf - and every major league and competition!

theScore delivers real-time scoring updates and alerts, breaking news, the deepest in-game stats, videos, and social content. theScore is fast, comprehensive, and super simple to use:

*BET MODE- Get into Bet Mode to unlock the ultimate gaming experience between theScore and theScore Bet: Sportsbook & Casino, including the ability to build and track your bets, lightning-fast scores, pregame and live markets, and deep betting coverage.
*FAVOURITES - This is YOUR personalised feed. All the content you care about from your favourite teams, players and leagues. Tap ‘Manage’ to add, delete or reorder your favourites. Never miss a key moment when you set-up your notifications!

*SCORES - A live view of every game updated in real-time. Select the matchup for the full boxscore, including team and player stats, odds and lines, last plays, news, and more.

*CHAT & MESSAGING - Who doesn’t like talking sports? Check out our cool chat and messaging features and connect with other fans around the leagues, teams and games you care about.

*DISCOVER - Stay in the know on the biggest social stories and multimedia content that’s got sports fans talking!

*NEWS - Get updated on the top headlines in an instant across all sports, including comprehensive betting coverage, fantasy analysis, and more.

*LEAGUES - Check out the latest news, scores, standings, and leaders for all the sports you care about.

theScore offers deep coverage and real-time alerts for every major league and competition, including:

- Football (NFL Football, NCAA Football, and CFL Football, regular season and playoffs)
- Baseball (College World Series and MLB Baseball, season play and playoffs)
- Basketball (NBA Basketball, WNBA Basketball, NCAA Basketball - including the NCAA Men’s Basketball Tournament and playoffs)
- Hockey (NHL Hockey, IIHF WJHC - World Junior Hockey Championship, NCAA Frozen Four)
- Soccer (Premier League Soccer, Champions League, FIFA World Cup, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, MLS, - FA Cup, League Cup, Europa League, Ligue 1, Coppa Italia, Copa Del Rey and Liga MX, UEFA European Championships)
- Golf (PGA, LPGA, Ryder Cup, European Tour, Web.com Tour)
- Tennis (ATP, WTA), with the US Open coming in August
- Mixed Martial Arts (MMA: UFC and Bellator)
- Auto Racing (NASCAR Sprint Cup, Formula 1)
- Lacrosse (NLL)

__

Need help, have feedback or want to request a new feature? Contact us via the Settings menu or email us via support@thescore.com. You can also chat to us on Twitter via @theScoreHelp.

Website: www.thescore.com
Privacy Policy: www.thescore.com/pages/privacy
Terms of Use: www.thescore.com/pages/terms
